structure.unit: ARTICLE II. STANDARDS FOR ACCEPTANCE OF CONVEYANCES USED FOR SCENIC OUTDOOR RECREATIONAL OR PARK PURPOSES OR COVENANTS NOT TO USE LAND FOR OTHER THAN SUCH PURPOSES

text.section:
Sec. 25B-19. Savings clause.
Unless the owner indicates otherwise to the Board, covenants and conveyances accepted by this Board prior to amendments of this article or the State enabling law (Section 193.501, Florida Statutes) shall remain in effect for the first ten-year period of such covenant or conveyance, provided that the terms and conditions of the covenant or conveyance are maintained.
